task_text: OUT/IN/indicator elements render incorrectly; also lingering node-dot artifacts remain after clearCircuit() in the browser.
summary: Reproduced lingering node-dot artifacts after CircuitJS1.clearCircuit(); fixed by clearing simulator node-related state and resetting static node caches in CirSim.clearCircuit(). Verified OUT/IN/indicator rendering with fresh screenshots.

outcome.notes: After clearCircuit(), node dots no longer linger; OUT/IN/SevenSeg/DecimalDisplay render check captured. If OUT still looks wrong in a specific user circuit, weâ€™ll need that circuit to reproduce (export/import) since basic element rendering is OK.
